**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 296 2.0 **Usage** worn garment **Bulk** L --- This loose robe has wide, voluminous sleeves that each contain an extradimensional space. These spaces each function as a spacious pouch that can hold up to 5 Bulk of items (for a total of 10 Bulk), though no individual item can be of more than 1 Bulk; the sleeves grow slightly heavy as you reach maximum capacity. You can add or remove an item from a sleeve with a single hand free as an Interact action.
If a sleeve is completely empty, you can place your own familiar into that extradimensional space. It can survive comfortably in your sleeve for up to 1 hour, after which it begins to suffocate. While in your sleeve, it can't be affected or targeted by any effects, but you don't benefit from any master abilities. A familiar can exit the sleeve of its own volition with a single action that has the manipulate and move traits. You can't place any other creature into your sleeves, nor can you place your familiar in a sleeve if it's larger than Tiny. If your familiar is in your sleeve, you can't place any items in the sleeve. Sleeves of Storage **Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 296 2.0, [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 263 2.0 **Price** 100 gp Sleeves of Storage (Greater) **Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 296 2.0, [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 263 2.0 **Price** 600 gp --- Each sleeve can hold up to 20 Bulk of items, and a familiar can survive within a sleeve for up to 4 hours.
